assignments.label: Progress Status to Board Pack Preparation

choices.name: as_a_copy_of_existing_approved_Board_Pack
choices.choiceText: As a copy of the latest Boardpack

choices.name: as_a_copy_of_existing_Working_Board_pack
choices.choiceText: As a copy of the Working Version (if applicable)

choices.name: as_a_new_fresh_Board_Pack
choices.choiceText: as a new fresh Board Pack

Flow.description: Create new Acquisition Deal and create new set of related records (Title Context, Financials, Comps etc) as a clone of either Working or Approved version. Then assign them to the corresponding lookups on the newly created Acquisition Deal. Version setting Record Types on related objects

formulas.description: FALSE it the cloned PrimaryTerm record is Approved (no need for re-approval) TRUE otherwise
formulas.name: isPrimaryTermNotApproved

Flow.interviewLabel: Acquisition Deal Create New Flow Alike {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Acquisition Deal Create New Flow Alike

recordLookups.description: and make it available for edits
recordLookups.name: Fetch_New_Acquisition_Deal
recordLookups.label: Fetch New Acquisition Deal

fields.name: CloneBoardPackMessage_0
fields.fieldText:
This Acquisition Deal will be cloned.
Please make your selection for creation of associated board pack :

fields.name: CloneBoardPackMessage
fields.fieldText:
This Acquisition Deal will be cloned.
Please make your selection for creation of associated board pack :

fields.name: NoCopyMessage
fields.fieldText: The Deal does not have neither working nor approved version. There is nothing to copy.

fields.name: CloneBoardPackMessage_1
fields.fieldText:
This Acquisition Deal will be cloned.
Please make your selection for creation of associated board pack :

fields.name: NewBoardPackMessage
fields.fieldText: A new Board Pack will be created. To create the Board Pack, Title has to be defined. Other information can be entered later. Please enter below the Title name.

fields.name: TitleInput
fields.fieldText: Title

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText:
Success!
A new Acquisition Deal was created succesfully.
Deal Name: {!newAcquisitionDeal.Name}
Board Pack version: {!newAcquisitionDeal.Board_Pack_Version__c}
Click Finish to proceed to your new Deal.

subflows.name: Clone_Boardpack_From_Old_to_New
subflows.label: Clone Boardpack From Old to New
